org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client
Class MockIngestClient

java.lang.Object
  org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.AbstractClient
      org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.AbstractIngestClient
          org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.IngestClient
              org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.MockIngestClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientFactory, DocumentIngest, Ingest
public class MockIngestClient
extends IngestClient

Mock ingest client. Do not perform actions on a real cluster. Useful for testing or dry runs.

newClient

public MockIngestClient newClient(URI uri)
Description copied from class: IngestClient
Create new client with concurrent ingestProcessor processor.

The URI describes host and port of the node the client should connect to, with the parameter es.cluster.name for the cluster name.

Specified by:
newClient in interface ClientFactory
Overrides:
newClient in class IngestClient

uri - the cluster URI
